alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 08 at 10:39AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CHST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Eastern half of central and southern Guam. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1036 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 1 inches of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Yona, Talofofo, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
